business_definition: Date when the authorization request was initiated or received (YYMMDD format)
Time when the authorization request was initiated or received (HHMMSS format)
Credit or debit card number associated with the authorization request
Type or category of authorization being requested
Expiration date of the card used in the transaction (MMYY format)
Type of message being sent for the authorization request
Source system or channel from which the authorization message originated
Processing code that identifies the type of transaction and accounts affected
Monetary amount of the transaction being authorized
Merchant Category Code (MCC) that classifies the type of business or merchant
Country code of the acquiring institution processing the transaction
Point of Sale entry mode indicating how card data was captured
Unique identifier assigned to the merchant location
Business name of the merchant where the transaction occurred
City where the merchant is located
State or province where the merchant is located
Postal or ZIP code of the merchant location
Unique identifier for the authorization transaction request
